title: Laura M. Bandi
text:
Hi there! I’m a first-year PhD student in Psychological Science at Toronto Metropolitan University (TMU) studying under the supervision of Dr. Alyssa Counsell in the Psychology And Statistics Education Research (PASER) Lab.
Research Interests

Post-secondary students’ statistical literacy, self-efficacy in learning statistics, attitudes towards statistics, and statistics anxiety
Improving statistics and research methods courses in the social sciences
Psychometrics and scale development
Scholarship of teaching and learning
